text: Felice "Cino" TortorellaAddio Cino Tortorella, scompare Zurlì, il mago più amato dai bimbi (27 June 1926 - 23 March 2017), was an Italian television presenter. He was best known for creating and conducting the Zecchino d'Oro festival of children's songs. He was the voice of Topo Gigio, he became a regular on The Ed Sullivan Show. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian television presenters Category:Italian journalists
